invite.title: Invite Friends

invite.inviteCodeDescription2: Each invitee can only be invited once

invite.allOrdersDesc: You receive cashback each time user makes payment
invite.retailerCashbackTip: Cashback will automatically enter your wallet, can be withdrawn to your payment address anytime
invite.generateNewCodeTip: Use different invite codes to track distribution channels
